thread.section_title: Latest Home and Away News, Spoilers and Cast Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: Pia Miller shares family photo with her boyfriend and sons
thread.title_full: Pia Miller shares family photo with her boyfriend and sons | Daily Mail Online

author: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
title: Pia Miller shares family photo with her boyfriend and sons
text:
She's a busy actress who said she will always prioritise her two young sons first.
And it looks like Pia Miller's sons Isaiah, 14, and Lenny, 10, have happily embraced her boyfriend of almost one year, film producer Tyson Mullane.
The 30-year-old took to Instagram to share family photo of the foursome at Padang Padang Beach in Bali.
Scroll down for video
Part of the family: Pia Miller has taken to Instagram to share a photo of herself with her sons and boyfriend Tyson Mullane
It's not clear whether they returned to the tropical Indonesian island for another getaway or a throwback photo from their luxury getaway earlier in the year.
It's believed this is the first picture she's shared on social media of herself with both her sons and Tyson, who all appeared very relaxed and happy in each other's company.
Pia's flashed her big, bright smile to the camera in her sporting a small black bikini and Adidas baseball cap.
Getting serious: The sweet photo appears to be the first picture she's shared on social media of herself with that both her sons and Tyson
Lenny kept his look cool in pink board shorts with a tucan print, as he held out a peace sign with his hand.
Meanwhile her boyfriend and older son Isaiah wore a pink and red towel around their waist as they casually looked away from the camera.
The Home And Away actress captioned the photo:'Monday // let's go,' as well as including cute monkey emojis.
She received plenty of praise from fans on Instagram.
One said: 'Aaahw, this picture is so beautiful!'
Quote: : 'Could not get a more beautiful bunch #familygoals.'
Sizzling in swimwear! Pia Miller posted a picture to Instagram on Friday that showed her wearing a bright bikini as she showed off her incredibly fit figure
Pia Miller has proved she also looks incredible in bright colours.
Taking to Instagram on Friday, the Home and Away star shared a snap that showed her flaunting her very fit physique in a tangerine bikini.
In the picture, Pia puts her sensational body front and centre, wearing a matching bikini top and bottoms from Coco Jane Swimwear.
The stunning star plays with her damp hair, drying off after a dip, as the bikini bottom's V-shape emphasised her incredibly taut torso.
Home and Away hottie: The soap star stripped down on the perfect summer's day in Bondi
The strapless bikini top featured a racy slit down the middle, revealing a glimpse of Pia's assets.
The picture was taken at Sydney's iconic Bondi Beach, and the swimwear's colour is striking against the backdrop of blue sky and crystal clear water.
It appears that Pia was indulging in Flashback Friday, having shared a similar image from the same shoot six days ago.
The sizzling snap was one of a several uploads Pia posted on Friday, as the actress's sons headed back to school.
Hot mama! Mum-of-two Pia stood out in the bold bikini
The mum-of-two shared an image of her oldest son, 14-year old Isiah, in his school uniform.
'Year 9... YEAR NINE!!' Pia repeated, as if in shock that her boy was growing up so fast.
Isiah looks strikingly similar to his mother, sharing both her dark features and her smile.
You can definitely tell they're related! Pia shared a photo of fourteen-year-old Isiah, who is starting Year Nine
Not leaving out her younger son, Pia then posted a photo of her 10-year-old boy Lenny, who has just started fifth grade.
'And my little grade fiver... mi amor #theygrowupsofast' the actress wrote beneath a photo of Lenny, who wears a baseball cap backwards and gives a cheeky grin to the camera.
The look-a-like trio recently enjoyed a getaway to Bali to relax and refuel before another busy year.
They were joined on their holiday by Pia's boyfriend, producer Tyson Mullane, signalling that their relationship is serious.
Cheeky son: Pia made sure to share photo of her youngest, Lenny, who is in Year 5
